actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to authorize a former staff investigator of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Committee on Governmental Affairs to present himself to be deposed and testify in a civil action and to authorize the release to the Arizona Director of Insurance of certain documents and other information in the possession of said Subcommittee.

summary.text: Authorizes a former staff investigator of the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Committee on Governmental Affairs to be deposed and to testify in a civil action. Authorizes the release to the Arizona Director of Insurance of certain documents and other information in the possession of such Subcommittee.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize a former staff investigator of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Committee on Governmental Affairs to present himself to be deposed and testify in a civil action and to authorize the release to the Arizona Director of Insurance of certain documents and other information in the possession of said Subcommittee.
